page.title: 07FAVOURITE LESSONS
page.content: In a class survey the favourite lessons were{Games, Design,Drama, {Library,Science,French,Music & English {Humanities and Maths. GAMES. Girls do games seperately from the boys. In the winter the girls play netball and in the summer they do rounders and athletics. In the winter the boys play rugby and in the summer they do athletics and cricket. {DESIGN.}In design there are four sections. Woodwork, Art, Metalwork and Cookery. You spend about ten weeks in each group. {SCIENCE.}We do experiments into acidity, elasticity etc.then write up the results.{DRAMA.}We work in groups and act out scenes.{FRENCH.}We mainly have to speak in FRENCH all lesson then do some written work.{LIBRARY.} Here we learn how research topics and use the{DEWEY SYSTEM.
